text: An la chuangzao nimen [ru a dan shengren], xian yong nitu, ranhou yong yidi jingye [ru a dan shengren de houyi], ranhou shi nimen chengwei pei'ou. Renhe nuren de huaiyun he fenmian, meiyou ta bu zhidao de. Wulun zengjia chang ming zhe de shou shu, haishi jianshao duanming zhe de nianling [zhu], meiyou yi jian bu jilu zai tian jing [“shou baohu de xian pai”] zhong. Zhe dui an la que shi rongyi de.
